Control Name: 14.2.4 Restrictions on changes to software packages
Control Statement: Modifications to software packages shall be discouraged, limited to necessary changes, and all changes shall be strictly controlled

control_attributes.Clause_Category: 14.2 Security in development and support processes
control_attributes.description: Modifications to software packages shall be discouraged, limited to necessary changes, and all changes shall be strictly controlled
